How to play:

In this game, you are given a deck of dice and your goal is to place them on the board to gain points.

At the bottom left is your draw pile and at the bottom right is your discard pile. The dice appeared at the bottom is your hand. You grab the dice on your hand and place them on the board. Placing a dice cost one Mana. You start with 3 Mana and replenishes every turn. All dice placed are sent to the discard pile.

Placing a dice will earn you points. Each dice colour will have a unique effect and placement rules. Strategize when and where to place a certain dice to maximize your score gain. placing a dice will also provide exp, once enough exp is collected, you level up and all the dice in your discard pile returns to your draw pile.

However, watch out that the game will end once you run out of dice in your draw pile and in your hand. The game also ends if the board was filled completely. Try making sure you are earning enough exp and keep the board clean to survive longer.

This game does not really end on it's own besides the conditions stated above. Try reaching for a high score and have fun.

On the right there are skill panels. You have 2 skills, one that rerolls the dice you are currently holding, the second one discards the dice in your hand. Using a skill will cost one skill point, and they replenish every turn like Mana. Skills can only be used when you are holding a dice.
